page.description: A framework for a mobile application with a Panel Navigator and multiple Panel Cards with a scrolling button bar.

description.p: This template can be used to build a mobile application with button bar that is used for navigating multiple views, or "Panels". The UX Component template contains a Panel Navigator with a footer containing a button bar. The button bar allows you to select the active Panel Card in the mobile application.

This template is similar to the [MobileAppFramework_PanelNavigator_with_TabButtons] template. The key difference is that the button bar is scrollable in this template, whereas the [MobileAppFramework_PanelNavigator_with_TabButtons] template's buton bar does not scroll.
